aboutMe.title: About me:
aboutMe.p1: Passionate about technology, data, and business.
aboutMe.p2: From IT I combine experience in development, process automation and business vision to create efficient and business-oriented solutions.
aboutMe.p3: My experience in Commercial and Finance areas gives me a holistic view to detect inefficiencies, automate processes and design scalable flows.
aboutMe.p4: I studied Marketing, Data Analytics, Data Science and Quantitative Finance, consolidating a technical profile with strong customer focus and business strategy.
aboutMe.p5: I work with tools like Python, JavaScript (React, Node.js), SQL and APIs, integrating systems in real and complex environments.
aboutMe.p6: I am motivated by challenges where I can combine development, automation and business vision to deliver solutions that make a difference.

why.title: Why?
why.p1: I love this question. So, I think it deserves a section in my portfolio: because it exposes what motivates me and why I do what I do.
why.p2: Why I do what I do? Because I am passionate about it.
why.p3: As a child, when I discovered something new and exciting, I could spend hours researching, learning, and building, until I lost track of time.
why.p4: That feeling —of excitement, curiosity, and constant learning— continues to guide me today. And working in technology gives me that feeling every day.
why.p5: Over time, I realized that for me it's simple: I enjoy solving problems, automating processes, and building solutions that work. I'm motivated to work on projects that truly excite me and where I can add real value.
why.p6: If something interests me, I get fully involved. And if I work in your team or on your project, I'll approach it with the same curiosity and commitment.

1.title: Finance Tracker
1.short: Web app with IA integration and shopping cart that allows users to register and manage their personal finances in a simple and intuitive way.
1.desc: Project of a SAAS with landing page and interactive dashboard developed for personal finance tracking and improvement with an intuitive and modern user interface.
1.feature1: Payment and subscription management for user access.
1.feature3: Backend management with related databases and API.
1.feature4: Integration with OpenAI API, with chatbot inside the app and in WhatsApp.

2.title: Miel Bakery
2.short: Landing page of a bakery, with catalog of products and price calculator for clients.
2.desc: Landing page of a bakery, focused on communication and price quotation of orders without the need to register or contact form, focusing on conversion by WhatsApp.

3.title: Diamond Studio - Manicure
3.short: Manicure website with B2C and B2B clients, appointment scheduling, contact form and shopping cart. Including email marketing system and customer management system.
3.desc: Manicure website prepared to manage B2C and B2B clients, with contact form and shopping cart focused on WhatsApp by order of the client. Includes a personalized email marketing system and a customer management system.
3.feature3: Custom made manager to automate product loading.

4.title: La Alfarera Workshop
4.short: Landing page for a pottery studio, with the target to show the services and techniques for the clients.
4.desc: Landing page for a pottery studio, with the target to show the services and techniques for the clients.
